Patterns

Different patterns and components, with detailed articles and breakdowns on how to build them, testing and picking the best for your project.

  • Checkbox

    How to properly mark up a checkbox and customizing its design taking in consideration that the result is accessible and easy to use.

  • Pagination

    When there is a lot of content to display, using pagination will help us to add navigation links to reveal more content on the page.

  • Mobile Navigation

    How we should build a mobile navigation pattern? In this article we will go through different ideas and scenarios to build a better mobile navigation.

  • Skip Navigation Link

    Imagine that your mouse is not working and you want to use the keyboard to browse the web. With the skip link, you will be able to jump quickly to the content without tabbing through every single link in the website header.

  • Search Form

    When building a search component, it's important to take accessibility in mind from the beginning. We will explore some bad things to avoid and then show the final pattern with testing results and videos.

  • Page Title

    A page title is the most important thing in a web page. Imagine a document without a title? We will explore different ways to use page titles under different circumstances

Disclaimer: I'm not an accessibility expert. Currently, I read a lot about it and try to learn as much as I can. As a result, you might find some wrong or unclear things in the articles. Please don't hesitate to ping me via Twitter on @shadeed9 or @weba11ymatters.
